Index.title: Learn English & Spanish
Index.subtitle: with a method that actually works
Index.paragraph: Personalized classes in Valencia for students and professionals. No boring textbooks, just real conversation.
Index.feat1Desc: Forget about filling in the blanks. We talk from minute one about topics you care about.
Index.feat2Desc: I design each session based on your goals, whether for work, an exam, or travel.
Index.feat3Desc: We adapt the classes to your lifestyle so learning a language isn't a burden.
Index.aboutText1: I've spent years helping people like you lose the fear of speaking a new language. My approach isn't based on old textbooks, but on real language use in everyday life.
Index.aboutText2: Whether you need English for your professional career in Valencia or you want to travel and connect with new people, I'm here to guide you every step of the way.
Index.ctaSubtitle: Book your first trial session or write to me with any questions. I'll be happy to help!

Footer.description: English and Spanish lessons that actually work. Valencia & Online.
